mapper.select: select * from lengtoo_emojipackage where createdate < #{date} and isshow = 1 order by createdate desc limit #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lengtoo_emojipackage (thumbnailurl, title, description, createdate, numberofuse, emojitotal, imgwidth, imgheight, isshow, istop, isnew) values (#{thumbnailurl}, #{title}, #{description}, #{createdate}, #{numberofuse}, #{emojitotal}, #{imgwidth}, #{imgheight}, #{isshow}, #{istop}, #{isnew});
